text: Dwikhondito (2019) is an Indian Bengali film directed by Nabarun Sen. This was Sen's directorial debut film. The film tells a story of a writer suffering from Dissociative identity disorder. Saayoni Ghosh played role of a psychiatrist. == Cast == * Saswata Chatterjee * Soumitra Chatterjee * Koushik Kar * Saayoni Ghosh * Anjana Basu * Partha D Mitra * Tanima Das Sarkar == References == Category:2019 directorial debut films Category:2019 films Category:Indian films Category:2010s Bengali-language films ==External links== *
title: Dwikhondito
